info.name: Proxer.Me Modern Dark FIX (Work in Progress) 0.2
info.description:
This is my Work in Progress of a fixed "Proxer Modern Dark" Style.
(https://userstyles.org/styles/149419/proxer-modern-dark)
info.additionalInfo:
v0.2
- Fixes the stretched header image
(originally I edited the other theme, now it's included here :) )
- screenshots
v0.1
-Fixes a small error with Navigation

-changes a few colors of the forum (not completed yet but still readable)
-- if you want to use the original colors, delete everything between the last } and /* div. forum fixes */ in my code.
